thread.title: VW Faces Barrage of Litigation
thread.title_full: VW Faces Barrage of Litigation - WSJ

author: Mike Spector
title: VW Faces Barrage of Litigation
text:
Lawyers are moving to consolidate widespread litigation stemming from Volkswagen AG’s emissions-cheating scandal, drawing the German auto maker into a prolonged legal case expected to spur rafts of depositions and demands for billions of dollars in damages.
Plaintiffs’ lawyers filed more than two dozen lawsuits in courts across the U.S. within days of the Environmental Protection Agency’s Sept. 18 disclosure that Volkswagen admitted... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
